citeinfo.title: Census of Agriculture data: U.S. Geological Survey GAGES-II time series data update

descript.abstract: This dataset consists of a table of data derived from the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) Census of Agriculture (CoA) data as compiled by Falcone and LaMotte (2016) for the 9,067 conterminous United States sites of the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Geospatial Attributes of Gages for Evaluating Streamflow II (GAGES-II) dataset. The data include measures of crops, livestock, and land use. The data consist of time series covering the period 1950-2012 for 14 agricultural commodities and land uses: 10 of these represent production values per unit area, for example bushels of soybeans per square kilometer. These 10 commodities represent chickens, corn for grain, corn for silage, cotton, cows, alfalfa-hay, hogs/pigs, sheep, soybeans, and wheat. Four other variables represent the proportion of land in land uses: land on which commercial fertilizer is used, harvested cropland, irrigation, and orchards. Each of the 14 variable types has data for seven time periods: 1950, 1964, 1974, 1982, 1992, 2002, and 2012. Data are derived from national 1-kilometer resolution rasters.
descript.purpose: These data are intended as support for research efforts using the USGS GAGES-II sites.
descript.supplinf: This dataset is in support of study sites in the GAGES-II dataset (Falcone, 2011) and based on the watershed boundaries published there. The calculations for the 10 commodities representing production values are derived from rasters in which county data were allocated to agricultural land use (Falcone and LaMotte, 2016, LaMotte, 2015), based on land use rasters from the NAWQA Wall-to-wall Anthropogenic Landuse Trends (NWALT) dataset (Falcone, 2015; Falcone 2016). The calculations for the four land uses (fertilized land, harvested cropland, irrigation, and orchards) are from rasters based on county level data. The source data are described in Falcone and LaMotte (2016). References: Falcone, J.A., 2011, GAGES-II: Geospatial Attributes of Gages for Evaluating Streamflow, U.S. Geological Survey digital spatial data set, http://water.usgs.gov/GIS/metadata/usgswrd/XML/gagesII_Sept2011.xml. Falcone, J.A., 2015, U.S. conterminous wall-to-wall anthropogenic land use trends (NWALT), 1974–2012: U.S. Geological Survey Data Series 948, 33 p. plus appendixes 3–6 as separate files, http://dx.doi.org/10.3133/ds948. Falcone, J.A., and LaMotte, A.E., 2016, National 1-kilometer rasters of selected Census of Agriculture statistics allocated to land use for the time period 1950 to 2012: U.S. Geological Survey data release, https://doi.org/10.5066/F70R9MHS. Falcone, J.A., 2016, Mapping enhanced grazing potential based on the NAWQA Wall-to-wall Anthropogenic Land-use Trends (NWALT) product, 1974-2012: U.S. Geological Survey data release, http://dx.doi.org/10.5066/F7CR5RFF. LaMotte, A.E., 2015. Selected items from the Census of Agriculture at the county level for the conterminous United States, 1950-2012. U.S. Geological Survey data release, http://dx.doi.org/10.5066/F7H13016.

idinfo.accconst: None. Please see 'Distribution Info' for details.

attracc.attraccr: Values were spot checked against source data.

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted.

horizpa.horizpar: A formal accuracy assessment of the horizontal positional information in the data set has not been conducted.

vertacc.vertaccr: A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.

citeinfo.title: GAGES-II: Geospatial Attributes of Gages for Evaluating Streamflow

srcinfo.srccontr: Sites for which these data provide updated data.

procstep.procdesc: (1) Source rasters were downloaded from Falcone and LaMotte (2016). For the 10 production variables noted in the abstract, these were county-level rasters of production values for crops and livestock per square kilometer, based on county-level data allocated to land use pixels for the appropriate time period from the NAWQA Wall-to-wall Anthropogenic Landuse Trends (NWALT) dataset (Falcone, 2015; Falcone, 2016). For the four land use related variables these were county-level rasters not allocated to land use pixels. See Falcone and LaMotte (2016). These data had in turn been created from tabular data in LaMotte (2015).
(2) Watershed averages were calculated using the "run_zonal.aml" script developed by Curtis Price of the U.S. Geological Survey. This tool calculated zonal statistics from raster datasets.

enttyp.enttypl: Attribute Table for Census of Agriculture data, CensusOfAgriculture_1950-2012.txt
enttyp.enttypd: Data consist of a comma-separated text file, which contains data for agricultural related information.

attr.attrdefs: Corresponds to unique station identifier in GAGES-II

attr.attrdef: Chickens per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012). Based on census-time inventory of animals; excludes animals sold during the year.
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Bushels of corn for grain per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Corn for silage or green chop in units of green tons per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Cotton in units of bales per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Cows and cattle per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012). Based on census-time inventory of animals; excludes animals sold during the year.
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

rdom.attrunit: Cows and cattle per square kilometer

attr.attrdef: Proportion of watershed in land on which commercial fertilizer was applied, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Hay-alfalfa in units of dry tons per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Proportion of watershed in all harvested crops, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Hogs and pigs per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012). Based on census-time inventory of animals; excludes animals sold during the year.
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

rdom.attrunit: Hogs and pigs per square kilometer

attr.attrdef: Proportion of watershed in irrigated land, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Proportion of watershed in orchards, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Sheep per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012). Based on census-time inventory of animals; excludes animals sold during the year.
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Bushels of soybeans per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)

attr.attrdef: Bushels of wheat (all types) per square kilometer, for year XXXX (1950-2012).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of Agriculture, Falcone and LaMotte (2016), and LaMotte (2015)
